com.openkm.jaas

类 CustomLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.openkm.jaas.CustomLoginModule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule

    public class CustomLoginModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule
    Used when running on Tomcat. Need to create a file conf/jaas.config with: OpenKM { com.openkm.jaas.CustomLoginModule REQUIRED debug=true; };
    作者:
    pavila
